post.author: 김성욱
post.content:
Hello Brendan,
We came across your resume and we have the following opportunity. If you are interested please send me a Word copy of your resume.
Job Title: Solutions Developer III
Location: MISSISSAUGA, ___ON_______
Duration: 6 Months contract
Job Description:
Department Overview: The eChannels portfolio encompasses the online banking applications of EasyWeb, Info Site, Web Business Banking (WBB).
Specific Educational Requirements / Accreditations: • College Diploma or University degree in Computer Science • +5 years working experience JAVA, JSP, Websphere, web services, object grid • Some knowledge of PEGA’s PRPC product would be a definite asset as would exposure to mainframe technology. .
Other Qualifications / Skills / Experience: The successful candidate will be required to work with individual project teams, support groups, and External vendors. Competencies include: • Strong Leadership and people skills • Strong design and documentation skills. • Experienced in the use of SDLC methodologies • Excellent Java knowledge and experience • Proven track record developing code for medium to large size projects with high complexity. Minimum 5 years experience • Solid understanding of the web development cycle • Proven track record with code deployments • Ability to work effectively with others; self motivated & a team player • Excellent communication skills with an ability to translate highly technical concepts to our Business partners • Flexible and able to adapt to change easily • Development experience / exposure on applications consuming Web services and / or development of Web Services
QualificationRating Skills Is this candidate a former TD contractor? *Yes JAVA *6+ Yrs. JSP (Java Server Page) *6+ Yrs. Leadership *6+ Yrs. Program Debugging *6+ Yrs. Program Documentation *6+ Yrs. Program Encoding *6+ Yrs. SDLC (Software Development Life Cycle) *6+ Yrs. System Programming *6+ Yrs. Web Servers *6+ Yrs. WebSphere *5+ Yrs.
Thank you,
Priya Darshini Phone: (613) 502-0967 Email: pdarshini@gttit.com
post.title: TD Bank, Mississauga, 6 months, Cont'
